comment: The pinnacle of: . The US said from the beginning Canada was not a problem when it came to NAFTA. Mexico was. . Canada was offered a bilateral deal. Freeland refused. . Mexico and the US drafted a bilateral deal -- USMCA. . Freeland takes deal on last day, on the State's terms. . Freeland / Trudeau caused a ONE YEAR in delay causing $Bs of dollars in lost investments in to Canada. . Tariffs are still there, as Canada still refuses to close the China-loop where China is abusing the old NAFTA construct. . Oh, but look at FakeNews... Read this in a baby voice so liberals can understand: Who's "saving the country"?
